content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case heard in the district court in ljubljana the case is identified as settlement p 4132017 and the hearing took place on october 10 2017 the text explains the cost procedure of the case stating that one party will be responsible for bearing the costs the procedure lasted from november 16 2016 to october 10 2017 which is a total of 1 year 1 month and 7 days the final resolution of the lawsuit involves dividing assets between the plaintiff who owns two real estate properties and the defendant who owns a share in a business the total value of the goods involved in the lawsuit is 52416000 eur the decision in this case was based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 which deals with court settlements the court settlement in this case is confidential meaning that the details cannot be disclosed lastly there is no translation available for this document
